channel.title: quantum computing on Day 1 HPC (Staging)
channel.description: Recent content in quantum computing on Day 1 HPC (Staging)

item.title: Spooky-action-at-a-distance As a Service (Quantum Computing)
item.description: Amazon Braket is AWS’s Quantum Computing service which gives you access to several Quantum Computers using a serverless programming model and … YOU ACTUALLY GET TO USE REAL QUANTUM COMPUTERS without needing a $50M budget and a cryo facility. This is therefore one of the weirdest Tech Shorts we’ve done. We even run a Quantum version of ‘Hello, world’. No kidding. You can get more information about the service at aws.amazon.com/braket But : why not try it yourself? If you have ideas for technical topics you’d like to see us cover in a future show, let us know by finding us on Twitter (@TechHpc) and DM’ing us with your idea.
